content.question: Which of the following represents the magnetic flux through the loop while the magnitudes of the fields are decreasing?

choices.label: <math alttext="uppercase B sub 1, end subscript lowercase a lowercase b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Uppercase B sub 2, end subscript lowercase a lowercase b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, uppercase B sub 1 minus uppercase B sub 2, close parenthesis, lowercase a lowercase b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>âˆ’</mo><msub><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, uppercase B sub 1 plus uppercase B sub 2, close parenthesis, lowercase a lowercase b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="uppercase B sub 1, end subscript lowercase a lowercase b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
